description: This file defines a REST controller named HelloController for a Spring Boot application, providing basic system endpoints such as health check, documentation redirect, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for health check, documentation redirect, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the application is running

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects user to the Swagger UI page, preserving original request scheme, host, and port

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string indicating the application is healthy

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns a string with basic application information
